content-support-dialog:
The Katya ¬Æ üëΩ community is here to help you however we can.

Feel free to join our Support chat or send us an email. Please be aware email can take anywhere from 1-5+ business days for a reply!
content-remove-screen-lock: Are you sure you want to remove the screen lock? This will also remove the pin protection of the cache
content-logout-multiaccount-confirm: Since you have other accounts, logging out will switch you to another account session.

content-key-backup-warning:
Due to background processing on iOS, your scheduled backup may or may not fire based on battery, processing power, and other factors.

Always make sure your backups are being saved appropriately.

content-notification-style-type-inbox: Group new messages within one notification
content-notification-style-type-itemized: A new notification will appear for every new message
content-notification-style-type-latest: Show one notification with the most recent message

between syncing

subtitle-toggle-suggestions: Beware that keyboards may send suggestions data to third-parties
alert-hidden-read-receipts: Hidden Read Receipts must be supported by your Katya ¬Æ üëΩ AI üß† REChain ü™ê Blockchain Node, or this will have the same effect as switching Read Receipts 'On'!

Are you sure you want to use advanced color selection?

Selecting the same color
as the background may prevent you from seeing parts of the app!

{} does not yet support viewing archived chats.
confirm-archive-chat-single:
Are you sure you want to archive the chat "{}"?
{} does not yet support viewing archived chats.

Even if you don't send a message, the user will still see your invite to chat if they exist.

Do you want to try chatting with this username?
confirm-auth-verification: In order to perform this action, you'll need to enter your password again!
confirm-block-user: If you block {}, you will not be able to see their messages and you will immediately leave this chat!
confirm-delete-chat-multi: Are you sure you want to delete all {} selected chats? Messages sent in these chats will be lost forever!
confirm-delete-chat-single: Are you sure you want to delete the chat "{}"? Messages sent in this chat will be lost forever!
confirm-delete-keys: Are you sure you want to delete your encryption keys for this device? This is very destructive and will probably render all your encrypted messages undecryptable!
confirm-enable-notifications:
Your device will now prompt you to turn on notifications for {}.

Do you want to turn on message notifications?
confirm-encryption: After you encrypt a chat, you cannot go back to sending messages unencrypted. Are you sure you want to encrypt this chat?
confirm-encryption-group:
After you encrypt a chat, you cannot go back to sending messages unencrypted. Are you sure you want to encrypt this group chat?

Please be aware Group E2EE is still a work in progress!

content-captcha-warning:
Some Katya ¬Æ üëΩ AI üß† REChain ü™ê Blockchain Nodes 
require captcha confirmation provided by Google through reCAPTCHA. 

If you'd prefer not to complete this captcha, you may need to go back to Node select and choose a different Node for account creation!

content-password-requirements:
Each Katya ¬Æ üëΩ AI üß† REChain ü™ê Blockchain Node may have different requirements for passwords.

If you're having trouble, try creating a password including a lower-case letter, an upper-case letter, a number and a symbol, and with at least 8 characters!

content-signup-email-requirement:
This Katya ¬Æ üëΩ AI üß† REChain ü™ê Blockchain Node 
requires an email for registration. Your email will be visible to whoever or whatever is in control of this Node! Make sure you trust this Node before submitting this information!
content-signup-email-verification: This Katya ¬Æ üëΩ AI üß† REChain ü™ê Blockchain Node requires a verified email to complete registration. You'll need to click the link in the email address to continue. Make sure you trust this Node before clicking the verification link!
content-sync-interval: Syncing works by submitting a long poll request to the Katya ¬Æ üëΩ AI üß† REChain ü™ê Blockchain Node Network. The sync interval is not how frequently it will sync, but how frequently it will attempt a new long poll request!
